name: One Night at Teki's 2
description:
The second installment of the One Night at Teki's series!

I know the game is bad, it's just an inside joke, but at least it's way better than the first one.

This game will still be updated, and it will probably changed a lot. It came out on Gamejolt 3 months ago but only I decided to post it on itch.io.
